title: Hello there,
text:
Hello there,
I am an quantitative analyst within competition economics. I enjoy solving quantitative problems and automating “boring tasks” using my in-depth knowledge of statistical programming languages (primarily R) and other open source tools such as Git, Quarto, and shell scripting.
